title: Clamato Shrimp Cocktail
directions: Mix shrimp, with lemon juice, tomatoes, onion, Sunkist(R) or Crush(R) orange flavor, Ketchup, Clamato(R) Original or Picante flavor, Salt & pepper to taste, Worcestershire Sauce, hot sauce (to taste) and refrigerate for 30 minutes. Before serving add avocado.
ingredients: 2 1/2 pounds large cooked (grilled) shrimp, cut in half
1/2 cup Sunkist or Crush orange-flavor soda
2 cups Clamato Original or Picante flavor
